name: Black Hat
description:
The year is 2035.

The Automation Revolution is in full force. The unemployment rate is rapidly climbing, breaking records on a daily basis. The few that thrive are getting fewer and those that remain see their empires grow faster than ever before.

In New York City, crime is on the rise. The poorest neighborhoods are plagued by robberies, petty theft and murder more than ever before.

You are a part of the lucky few who had escaped the life of crime. To do so, you had to do some morally questionable things. 

You hope that now it is all behind you...
